response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by its creators, reflecting its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its unparalleled benefits and capabilities, I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business operations. To make this opportunity accessible, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product for $11,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
